pr_title: fix issue 658 about getting component list

timeline.message: fix issue 658 about getting component list

timeline.author: Xiaochao8

replies.bodyText: GetComponentList() doesn't return null. it must return an object.
replies.author: jin-jasper

replies.bodyText: sonarQube forced me to change from returning null to returning a list with no items.
replies.author: jin-jasper
